source_objects.description: Communicate better with these powerful courses in written and verbal communications.
source_objects.title: Communication

items.title: 12 Strategies for Dealing With Difficult People

visible_instructors.name: Steve
visible_instructors.job_title: Former police officer sharing life saving strategies.
visible_instructors.title: Steve Schmidt

items.headline: Learn how to confidently implement different strategies for dealing with difficult people.
objectives_summary: Utilize communication tactics to prevent the difficult situation before it starts.
Impliment a host of communication stratigies to take control of a difficult situation.
Better articulate the reasoning behind the specific communication skills used in difficult situations.

items.title: Collaboration and Emotional Intelligence
items.headline: Determine how to build more collaborative relationships using your emotional intelligence.
objectives_summary: Determine why a collaborative approach is beneficial in teamwork
Recognize why collaboration is underpinned with good emotional intelligence
Evaluate ways to work with the principles and characteristics of collaboration - what works best, when and where

items.title: Presentation Skills: Master Confident Presentations
items.headline: Deliver exceptional presentations and become a confident public speaker
objectives_summary: Be a memorable and confident speaker
Give a presentation without notes or cue cards
Master professional PowerPoint design and get your message across clearly

items.title: Business Skills: Email Etiquette Rules Everyone Should Know
items.headline: Immediately Improve Your Writing Skills, Boost Your Productivity and Avoid Common Errors
objectives_summary: save time and reduce communication frustration
explain circumstances when sending an email is necessary and / or appropriate
identify situations when sending or retrieving emails is not acceptable

items.title: Writing With Confidence: Writing Beginner To Writing Pro

visible_instructors.name: Clare
visible_instructors.job_title: Cambridge University writing tutor & professional copywriter
visible_instructors.title: Clare Lynch

items.headline: Pro copywriter/Cambridge University writing teacher reveals the secrets for writing blogs and business docs that enthral
objectives_summary: Find your voice as a business writer, blogger or writer of other non-fiction
Transform writing from dull to dazzling - within the first 10 mins of the course
Uncover the secret persuasion tactics known only to the world’s top copywriters

items.title: Complete Guide to Conflict Management in the Workplace

visible_instructors.name: Transformation
visible_instructors.job_title: International Academy of Life Coaching & Entrepreneurship
visible_instructors.title: Transformation Services

items.headline: Conflict management: learn conflict resolution skills & effective listening, communication & problem solving techniques
objectives_summary: Stop feeling distracted, anxious, or frustrated about conflict with your coworkers, boss, or employees
Stop avoiding conflict and allowing tension and resentment to fester, leading to long term consequences
Use differences of opinion and conflicts constructively, leading to growth and creativity

items.title: How to Present Your Thoughts Smoothly, Clearly & Powerfully

visible_instructors.name: Michael
visible_instructors.job_title: Speech Coach for Professionals Who Stutter
visible_instructors.title: Michael Williams

items.headline: How You Can Feel Calmer, Be Confident and Speak Smoothly, Especially Under Pressure
objectives_summary: Feel calmer and more relaxed under pressure
Perform well while under pressure
Speak smoothly

items.title: Speak Like a Pro: Public Speaking for Professionals
items.headline: Master presentation skills and impromptu speaking, conquer speech anxiety, and get your point across to any audience
objectives_summary: Connect with any audience and make them care about your message
Get your point across without rambling
Conquer your speech anxiety

items.title: Write Like a Boss: Master Your Business Writing Skills
items.headline: How to write better emails and proposals, save valuable time, and develop powerful written communication skills.
objectives_summary: Save time and reduce uncertainty by using a 3-step writing process.
Analyze what your audience wants, needs, and expects from emails, reports, and proposals.
Write emails that demonstrate your emotional intelligence.

items.title: The Foundations of Fiction (Writing Mastery)

visible_instructors.name: Jessica
visible_instructors.job_title: International Bestselling Author and Writing Teacher
visible_instructors.title: Jessica Brody

visible_instructors.name: Joanne
visible_instructors.job_title: Novelist, Writing Teacher, and PhD in English Literature
visible_instructors.title: Joanne Rendell

items.headline: Become a creative writing master and write killer novels, memoirs, or short stories
objectives_summary: Master the 6 universal foundations that make up ALL great fiction
Create complex, realistic characters who will jump right off the page
Write vibrant, riveting dialogue that will breathe life into your scenes

items.title: Assertive Communication Skills Masterclass

visible_instructors.name: Kara
visible_instructors.job_title: Leadership & Soft Skills for Emerging Leaders
visible_instructors.title: Kara Ronin

items.headline: Assertive Communication Skills for Business & Social Life. Speak Confidently. Set Boundaries. Difficult conversations.
objectives_summary: Move from being a passive communicator to a confident, assertive communicator.
Say “no” and establish boundaries without feeling guilty.
Make clear requests to your team members, friends and family.

items.title: Acumen Presents: Chris Anderson on Public Speaking

visible_instructors.name: Acumen Academy
visible_instructors.job_title: Global Learning Community for Social Change-Makers
visible_instructors.title: Acumen Academy Courses

items.headline: The Head of TED Teaches You How to Deliver Talks that Share Powerful Ideas
objectives_summary: craft an effective throughline for a talk
understand 5 different ways to structure your talk
learn the most effective ways to start your talk & get your audience on board

items.title: Punctuation Mastery
items.headline: A Non-Technical Guide To Using Punctuation With Style
objectives_summary: Learn how to apply punctuation stylishly
Write with more confidence and flair
Spruce up your reports, essays, resumes, books, blogs and articles

items.title: Editing Mastery: How To Edit Writing To Perfection
items.headline: The Deep Editing Secrets Of The World's Best Editors
objectives_summary: You will receive an Editing Mastery Certificate of Completion after finishing the course.
You will discover how top editors create captivating copy for millions of readers every day.
You will learn how to professionally edit almost any type of nonfiction writing.

items.title: Develop Amazing Social Skills & Connect With People
items.headline: Develop Amazing Social Skills, Social Confidence, Communication Skills, Self Esteem, Charisma, Self confidence
objectives_summary: Start A New Conversation With Anyone
Make A Powerful First Impression
Connect With People Instantly

items.title: Digital Diversity/Cyber-Citizen/Cross Cultural Communication

visible_instructors.name: Elizabeth
visible_instructors.job_title: Global Leadership Developer: Diagnose Design Decide Deliver
visible_instructors.title: Elizabeth Pagé

items.headline: Connecting Across Cultures: Multi-cultural, "-national, "-generational, "-sectoral, "-lingual, and "-stakeholder Teams
objectives_summary: How to use specific communications tools effectively to hit your target market with the right message via the right medium at the right time.
Create a Communications Charter with and for your team setting expectations and standards for connecting.
Implement a Communications Matrix with specified channels, media, frequency, and messages for your target audiences.
